dataset.select: SELECT id, class, name, COALESCE (registration_num, 0) AS registration_num, COALESCE (owner, '') AS owner, COALESCE (description, '') AS description FROM boat WHERE ID = {{id|1}}
dataset.update: UPDATE boat SET name = BTRIM ({{name}}), class = BTRIM ({{class}}), registration_num = NULLIF ({{registration_num}}, 0), owner = NULLIF (BTRIM ({{owner}}), ''), description = NULLIF (BTRIM ({{description}}), ''), change_user = {{__username}}, change_date = datetime ('now') WHERE ID = {{id}}
